caption.p: List of model cell states which include anatomic cell types as well as signalling mediators and behavioural descriptors

tr.td: MZ pseudo-cells surround the epiblast and form a boundary
initial ring of cells with shape altered to minimize local curvature and epiblast cell density, then adjusted to control epiblast area
initial disc of cells; increased by cell division; decreased by ingression
cells attempting to ingress from the epiblast in a Nodal-dependent process
flags whether or not EMT cell remains tethered to epiblast epithelium
tethered emt cells may re-incorporate into the epithelium whereas untethered cells are committed to progress to mesenchyme
cells which have completed transition to mesenchyme
end result of EMT; a terminal, inactive state in these simulations
initially present in PS forming region; cells may be converted to positive by neighbours
Wnt-PCP(+) cells capable of oriented intercalation
initially present in the PS forming region; cells may be converted to positive by neighbours
calculated by consensus among Wnt-PCP(+) cells

fn.p: Colour codes can be matched to simulation images in Figures 6 and 7 and Supplementary Videos.
